boat.construction_details: Hull and deck is ferrocement, coachroof, cockpit coaming and rubbing strake are wood.

for_sales.sales_text:
Lily Lodestone was designed by Percy Dalton on the lines of the Falmouth Oyster Dredger. Hull and Deck are ferrocement. She has a Bukh diesel engine 20hp, which is in running order. Her sails were made by JR Williams of Hamble. Lily Lodestone is lying ashore on the River Dart and needs a new home and TLC.

Her asking price has been reduced from £4,500 to £2,000.

Contact John Smith +44(0)1803 832294

boat.full_description: 'Lily Lodestone' was designed by Percy Dalton on the lines of the Falmouth Oyster Dredger. Hull and deck are ferrocement.
boat.name: Lily Lodestone
boat.short_description: Lily Lodestone was designed by Percy Dalton on the lines of the Falmouth Oyster Dredger.
